table.name: invoice_lineitem
table.description: One record per line item within an invoice.   The line item has no direct relation to the S_SHIP_UNIT_LINE table, since invoice lines consist of a variety of things, including accessorial charges.

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: LINEITEM_SEQ_NO
columns.description: Line item sequence number.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Text describing the line item on the invoice.

columns.name: UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: Unit count for that line.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the transport handling unit associated with the invoice line item.

columns.name: BILLABLE_INDICATOR_GID
columns.description: The indicator used to tell if this line item is billable (sell side bill only).

columns.name: FLEX_COMMODITY_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The flexible commodity qualifier GID.

columns.name: FLEX_COMMODITY_CODE
columns.description: Flex commodity code.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: Total weight for line item.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: Total volume for line item.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Weight unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Volume unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Weight in base units.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Volume in base units.

columns.name: WEIGHT_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Weight qualifier.

columns.name: MARKS
columns.description: Marks.

columns.name: MARKS_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Qualifier for Marks.

columns.name: BILLED_AS_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Qualifier for Billed as quantity.

columns.name: BILLED_AS_QUANTITY
columns.description: Billed as quantity.

columns.name: FREIGHT_RATE_QUALIFIER
columns.description: The qualifier for the freight rate.

columns.name: FREIGHT_RATE_VALUE
columns.description: Freight rate value.

columns.name: FREIGHT_RATE_VALUE_GID
columns.description: The freight rate value GID.

columns.name: FREIGHT_RATE_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The freight rate value in base units.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE
columns.description: The freight charge for this line item.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_GID
columns.description: The freight charge GID.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_BASE
columns.description: The freight charge in base units.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount that was already collected towards this invoice line item.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_GID
columns.description: The prepaid amount GID.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The prepaid amount in base units.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the method of payment for the invoice. Examples of payment include cash on delivery, check and electronic funds transfer.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for an accessorial code.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Text to describe the accessorial.

columns.name: COMPARTMENT_ID_CODE
columns.description: The identification number for the equipment's compartment for this line item.

columns.name: EXPORT_LIC_CONTROL_CODE
columns.description: Export license control code.

columns.name: EXPORT_LIC_COUNTRY_CODE3_GID
columns.description: The export license country code GID.

columns.name: EXPORT_LIC_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the export license expires.

columns.name: EXPORT_LIC_NUMBER
columns.description: The identification number for the export license.

columns.name: IMPORT_LIC_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date for the import license.

columns.name: IMPORT_LIC_ISSUE_DATE
columns.description: The issue date for the import license.

columns.name: IMPORT_LIC_NUMBER
columns.description: The import license number.

columns.name: TARIFF_AGENCY_CODE
columns.description: The code for the tariff agency.

columns.name: TARIFF_REFNUM
columns.description: Tariff reference number.

columns.name: TARIFF_REFNUM_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Tariff reference number qualifier.

columns.name: TARIFF_REFNUM_SUFFIX
columns.description: Suffix for the tariff reference number.

columns.name: TARIFF_SECTION
columns.description: Tariff section.

columns.name: TARIFF_ITEM_NUMBER
columns.description: Tariff item number.

columns.name: TARIFF_ITEM_NUMBER_SUFFIX
columns.description: Tariff item number suffix.

columns.name: TARIFF_ITEM_PART
columns.description: Tariff item part.

columns.name: TARIFF_SUPPLEMENT_ID
columns.description: Tariff supplement ID.

columns.name: TARIFF_REG_AGENCY_CODE
columns.description: Tariff Reg Agency.

columns.name: TARIFF_PUB_AUTHORITY
columns.description: Tariff Pub Authority.

columns.name: TARIFF_ISSUING_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The identification number for the carrier that issued the tariff.

columns.name: TARIFF_FREIGHT_CLASS_CODE
columns.description: The code for the tariff freight class.

columns.name: TARIFF_EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the tariff.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The declared value qualifier GID.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: The stated value of this line item.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_CURR_GID
columns.description: The declared value currency GID.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: Declared value in base units.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_REASON_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the adjustment reason code used to specify why an adjustment was made to the line.

columns.name: PROCESS_AS_FLOW_THRU
columns.description: Flag to identify this cost was processed as a flow thru and needs to be considered during adjustments.

columns.name: GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: GL code for the invoice line item.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used

columns.name: VAT_CODE_GID
columns.description: Used by the invoice action to manually calculate VAT. This field is intended to be user entered (via UI or integration) so that a VAT code may be applied to an entire invoice line item easily without the user having to specify invoice line item VAT records. The system does not populate this field.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the declared value.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the function currency for the declared value.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the freight charge.

columns.name: FREIGHT_CHARGE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the function currency for the freight charge.

columns.name: FREIGHT_RATE_V_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the freight rate.

columns.name: FREIGHT_RATE_V_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the function currency for the freight rate.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the prepaid amount.

columns.name: PREPAID_AMOUNT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the function currency for the prepaid amount.

columns.name: COST_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The cost type for the invoice line.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: The invoice line item indicator.

columns.name: OUT_OF_TOL_AMT
columns.description: The Out Of Tolerance Amount containing amount above or below the Payment Invoice Line approval tolerance allowable amount or percentage.

columns.name: OUT_OF_TOL_AMT_GID
columns.description: The out of tolerance amount currency.

columns.name: OUT_OF_TOL_AMT_BASE
columns.description: The out of tolerance amount in base currency.

columns.name: OUT_OF_TOL_REASON_CODE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the out of tolerance amount reason code.

columns.name: DEVIATION_AMOUNT
columns.description: The actual deviation in the tolerance amount based upon rule.

columns.name: DEVIATION_AMOUNT_GID
columns.description: Deviation amount currency.

columns.name: DEVIATION_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: Deviation amount in base currency.

columns.name: MATCH_STATUS
columns.description: Invoice line item status. UNMATCHED: It means the invoice line item has not been matched to any shipment cost. MATCHED: It means the invoice line item has been matched to shipment cost. MATCHED_IN_TOLERANCE: It means the invoice line item has been matched to shipment cost and passed the line level tolerance check. MATCHED_OUT_OF_TOLERANCE: It means the invoice line item has been matched to shipment cost and failed the line level tolerance check. UNMATCHED_IN_TOLERANCE: It means the invoice line item has not been matched to any shipment cost and it is within the tolerance limit. UNMATCHED_OUT_OF_TOLERANCE: It means the invoice line item has not been matched to any shipment cost and failed the line level tolerance check.
